name: UpdateUserProfile
description:
Update a user's profile information.

This tool updates the information of a user identified by a specific ID. It should be called when changes to a user's profile are needed, such as updating personal details or contact information.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the user to be updated.

value_schema.description: The ID of the user to update.

parameters.name: user_role_id
parameters.description: The role ID to assign to the user.

parameters.name: user_status
parameters.description: The updated status for the user. Options: `active`, `away`, or `out_of_office`.

value_schema.description: The new user status for the user. Can be one of `active`, `away`, or `out_of_office`.
